articles.description: Other audience members shushed heckler, and 12-year-old Malakai M Bayoh received ‘wild applause’ for performance in Handel’s Alcina
articles.content:
A heckler has been banned for life from the Royal Opera House after shouting rubbish at a 12-year-old actor during a production of Handels opera Alcina.
